title: Think someone has been using my acc
body:
So haven't played properly in a while, definitely haven't played at all since late last year. 

Downloaded the client again today and perhaps coincidentally received a riot points receipt which I thought was really odd and sparked my suspicions. 

I checked my match history and it looks like someone has been playing games since the 10th of last month and also playing a few today. I had a look back through my emails and there was one the lines up with when this started happening that was the confirmation for a change passwords on my account.

Pretty scary stuff even though I've been away from the game for some time. Any idea what I should do?

replies.body:
Change your password to something different immediately (but you probably already did that, good job you) and read [this guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account).

- If you're unable to change your password (due to email changes and whatnot), then try and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154) with the "I need help recovering my account" category selected.


- Even if you still have access to your account, create the ticket anyway and alert them of the situation, make sure to remind them someone had taken control of your account (i'm assuming without your knowledge) and purchased RP etc.


- If you're unaware of how they got your password, possibly run a virus/malware scan for any keyloggers or any other kind of nasty virus.

hi i tried to go into my settings for the first time in a long time and it said it sent it to the email i provided and i didnt realise at the time that it was my exs email address that i used as i didnt use mine for anything back then as she was always on hers and now i dont have access to it as we have been split up for over 2 years now i tried to submit a ticket so i can get the email address changed like you sugested but everytime i try it says i need to be logged in to submit that type of ticket even though i am already logged in and so i click on log in which is under it and it doesnt do anything its frustrating to no end please help do you have any ideas ?

thanks I appreciate it. It's strange because they originally gained access around 5 months after the last time I played the game. 

Bizarre.
Very bizzare, but Riot will try their best to sort it all out! :^)
